verses.roman:
ghṛta-sikta paramānna, mṛt-kuṇḍikā bhari'
cāṅpākalā-ghanadugdha-āmra tāhā dhari

synonyms: ghṛta-sikta parama-anna—sweet rice mixed with ghee; mṛt-kuṇḍikā bhari'-filling an earthen pot; cāṅpā-kalā—a kind of banana; ghana-dugdha—condensed milk; āmra—mango pulp; tāhā—that; dhari—including.
translation: Sweet rice mixed with ghee was poured into an earthen pot and mixed with cāṅpā-kalā, condensed milk and mango.
